result.title: SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Goldberg Law PC Announces Securities Class Action Lawsuit against Yahoo! Inc., and Encourages Investors with Losses to Contact the Firm
result.summary: Goldberg Law PC, a national shareholder rights litigation firm, announces the filing of a class action lawsuit against Yahoo! Inc. . Investors who purchased or otherwise acquired Yahoo! shares between November 12, 2013 through December 14, 2016 inclusive , are encouraged to contact the firm in advance of the March 27, 2017 lead plaintiff deadline.

result.title: Verizon earnings, subscriber additions fall short of estimates
result.summary: Shares of Verizon, which is in the process of buying Yahoo Inc's (YHOO.O) core assets as a way to diversify, were down 4.4 percent at $50.09 on Tuesday.  Verizon added 591,000 retail postpaid subscribers - those who pay their bills on a monthly basis - in the quarter overall, fewer than the 726,000 analysts had expected, according to market research firm FactSet StreetAccount.  Chief Financial Officer Matt Ellis said in an interview that the company's 167,000 phone subscriber additions were strong.
